name: Uwe Gensheimer
job: captain of the German national handball team
description: We love the practical diaper subscription from LILLYDOO, which even supplies us to France. In addition, with these diapers our little rascal stays nice and dry - despite a lot of exercise.

name: Nina Bott
description: To be honest, you already had me with the design - but since my late riser is still completely dry in the morning, I don't want any other diaper for my Lio!

name: Mari
description: We like the LILLYDOO diapers better than any other diaper that we have tried before. And there were so many with three children. We are absolutely thrilled!
